SELECT POC.PO_CATEGORY ||'-'|| SUBC.PO_SUBCATEGORY AS poCategorySubcategory, USD.PO_CATEGORY_ASSOC_ID AS poCategoryAssociationId, USD.VENDOR_ID
FROM SMC.SMC_UNIT_SIGNATURE_DEFINITION USD JOIN SMC.SMC_PO_CATEGORY_ASSOC asoc ON USD.PO_CATEGORY_ASSOC_ID = asoc.PO_CATEGORY_ASSOC_ID LEFT JOIN SMC.SMC_PO_CATEGORY POC ON POC.PO_CATEGORY_ID = asoc.PO_CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN SMC.SMC_PO_SUBCATEGORY SUBC ON SUBC.PO_SUBCATEGORY_ID = asoc.PO_SUBCATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN SMC.SMC_GLOBAL_EXCEPTIONS excp ON USD.UNIT_SIGNATURE=excp.UNIT_SIGNATURE WHERE excp.GLOBAL_EXCEPTION_ID = #{id}

SET PROVIDER_VENDOR_ID = #{providervendorId}, PROVIDER_PO_CATEGORY_ASSOC_ID = #{poCategoryAssociationId}, MODIFIED_BY = #{modifiedBy}, MODIFIED_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE GLOBAL_EXCEPTION_ID = #{exceptionId}
